Happy Monday! It's a little gloomy here in Los Angeles, but hope our Tweeps are having a brighter day! :)

@khayzmedina Due to security reasons, the passenger will have to contact the reservations center to retrieve the ticket number.
@khayzmedina ...and we'll have it sent to you again. Thank you!
@khayzmedina Hello! You should have received your e-tickets when you made your purchase.  DM us your 13-digit e-ticket # and email address..
@AncellTheemed Hope your flight was a good one! :)
@SoshiZombie We would never do such a thing!

@markked If you're an Asiana Club Gold member or above, you can get your card reissued at ICN airport! Just visit the AC counter.
